original: 吳郡吳縣人，東吳官員，顧雍之子。少時即富盛名，名超陸遜。龐統亦稱讚其有負重致遠的大才。有知人之能，所舉薦者多有所成。
text: A native of Wu County, Wu County, an official of Soochow Wu, son of Gu Yong. When he was young, he was rich and famous, and his name surpassed Lu Xun. Pang Tong also praised him for his great talents. With the ability to know people, many of the recommended ones have made a difference.
